Class Order

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.Order
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Customizable

    public class Order
extends java.lang.Object
implements Customizable
    Order class containing methods and information about a current order.
    Author:
    Craig Li, Prerak Patel
